00088 
00089 void PatchData::get_minmax_element_unsigned_area(double& min, double& max, MsqError &err)
00090 {
00091   if (!have_computed_info(MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA) ||
00092       !have_computed_info(MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA))
00093   {
00094     max=0;
00095     min=MSQ_DBL_MAX;
00096     size_t count = num_elements();
00097     for (size_t i=0; i<count; ++i) {
00098       double vol;
00099       assert( i<elementArray.size() );
00100       vol = elementArray[i].compute_unsigned_area(*this, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00101       if (vol > max)
00102         max = vol;
00103       if (vol < min)
00104         min = vol;
00105     }
00106     note_have_info(MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA);
00107     note_have_info(MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA);
00108     computedInfos[MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA] = max;
00109     computedInfos[MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA] = min;
00110   }
00111   else
00112   {
00113     max = computedInfos[MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA];
00114     min = computedInfos[MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA];
00115   }
00116     
00117   if (max <= 0 || min < 0 || min == MSQ_DBL_MAX)
00118     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00119 }
00120 
00121 void PatchData::get_minmax_edge_length(double& min, double& max) const
00122 {
00123   min = HUGE_VAL;
00124   max = -HUGE_VAL;
00125   
00126   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elements(); ++i) {
00127     const MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index(i);
00128     const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00129     const unsigned num_edges = TopologyInfo::edges( elem.get_element_type() );
00130     for (unsigned e = 0; e < num_edges; ++e) {
00131       const unsigned* edge = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( elem.get_element_type(), e );
00132       const double len_sqr = (vertex_by_index(conn[edge[0]]) - 
00133                               vertex_by_index(conn[edge[1]])).length_squared();
00134       if (len_sqr < min)
00135         min = len_sqr;
00136       if (len_sqr > max)
00137         max = len_sqr;
00138     }
00139   }
00140   min = sqrt(min);
00141   max = sqrt(max);
00142 }

00176 
00183 void PatchData::reorder()
00184 {
00185   size_t i, j;
00186   const size_t num_vertex = num_nodes();
00187   const size_t num_elem = num_elements();
00188 
00189   // Step 1: Clear any cached data that will be invalidated by this
00190   vertexNormalIndices.clear();
00191   normalData.clear();
00192   //vertexDomainDOF.clear();
00193 
00194   // Step 2: Make sure we have vertex-to-element adjacencies
00195   if (!vertAdjacencyArray.size())
00196     generate_vertex_to_element_data();
00197   
00198   // Step 3: Do breadth-first search
00199   std::vector<bool> visited( num_vertex, false );
00200   std::vector<size_t> vertex_order( num_vertex );
00201   std::vector<size_t>::iterator q1_beg, q1_end, q2_end;
00202   q1_beg = q1_end = q2_end = vertex_order.begin();
00203   // Outer loop will be done once for each disconnected chunk of mesh.
00204   while (q1_beg != vertex_order.end())
00205   {
00206       // Find vertex furthest from the origin
00207     double max = -1.0;
00208     size_t vtx_idx = num_vertex;
00209     for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
00210       if (!visited[i]) 
00211       {
00212         double dist = vertexArray[i].length_squared();
00213         if (dist > max)
00214         {
00215           max = dist;
00216           vtx_idx = i;
00217         }
00218       }
00219     assert( vtx_idx < num_vertex);
00220     
00221     *q2_end++ = vtx_idx;;
00222     visited[vtx_idx] = true;
00223     do {
00224       q1_end = q2_end;
00225       for ( ; q1_beg != q1_end; ++q1_beg)
00226       {
00227         size_t vtx_adj_offset = vertAdjacencyOffsets[*q1_beg];
00228         size_t vtx_adj_end    = vertAdjacencyOffsets[*q1_beg + 1];
00229         for (i = vtx_adj_offset; i < vtx_adj_end; ++i)
00230         {
00231           size_t elem = vertAdjacencyArray[i];
00232           assert( elem < elementArray.size() );
00233           size_t num_elem_verts = elementArray[elem].node_count();
00234           size_t* elem_verts = elementArray[elem].get_vertex_index_array();
00235           for (j = 0; j < num_elem_verts; ++j)
00236           {
00237             size_t elem_vert = elem_verts[j];
00238             if (!visited[elem_vert])
00239             {
00240               *q2_end++ = elem_vert;;
00241               visited[elem_vert] = true;
00242             }
00243           }
00244         }
00245       }
00246     } while (q2_end != q1_end);
00247   }
00248   
00249     // Step 4: vertex_order contains the list of current vertex indices
00250     //         in the opposite of the order that they will occur in the 
00251     //         reorderd patch.  The following code will construct veretx_map
00252     //         from vertex_order with the following properties
00253     //         - vertex_map will be indexed by the current vertex index and
00254     //           contain the new index of that vertex (inverse of vertex_order)
00255     //         - the vertices will be grouped by their free/slave/fixed flag.
00256   std::vector<size_t> vertex_map( num_vertex );
00257   const size_t fixed_vtx_offset = numFreeVertices + numSlaveVertices;
00258   size_t free_idx = 0, slave_idx = numFreeVertices, fixed_idx = fixed_vtx_offset;
00259   for (i = 1; i <= num_vertex; ++i)
00260   {
00261     size_t vtx_idx = vertex_order[num_vertex - i];
00262     if (vtx_idx < numFreeVertices) 
00263       vertex_map[vtx_idx] = free_idx++;
00264     else if(vtx_idx < fixed_vtx_offset)
00265       vertex_map[vtx_idx] = slave_idx++;
00266     else
00267       vertex_map[vtx_idx] = fixed_idx++;
00268   }
00269     // make sure everything adds up
00270   assert( free_idx == numFreeVertices );
00271   assert( slave_idx == fixed_vtx_offset );
00272   assert( fixed_idx == num_vertex );
00273 
00274 
00275     // Step 5: compute element permutation
00276     // initialize all to "num_elem" to indicate unvisited
00277   std::vector<size_t> element_map( num_elem, num_elem );  
00278   size_t elem_idx = 0;
00279   for (i = 1; i <= num_vertex; ++i) 
00280   {
00281     size_t vtx_idx = vertex_order[num_vertex - i];
00282     size_t vtx_adj_offset = vertAdjacencyOffsets[vtx_idx];
00283     size_t vtx_adj_end    = vertAdjacencyOffsets[vtx_idx + 1];
00284     for (j = vtx_adj_offset; j < vtx_adj_end; ++j)
00285     {
00286       size_t elem = vertAdjacencyArray[j];
00287       if (element_map[elem] == num_elem)
00288         element_map[elem] = elem_idx++;
00289     }
00290   }
00291     // make sure everything adds up
00292   assert( elem_idx == num_elem );
00293 
00294   // Step 6:  Permute the vertices
00295   std::vector<MsqVertex> new_vertex_array(num_vertex);
00296   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> new_vtx_handle_array(num_vertex);
00297   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i) {
00298     size_t new_idx = vertex_map[i];
00299     new_vertex_array[new_idx] = vertexArray[i];
00300     new_vtx_handle_array[new_idx] = vertexHandlesArray[i];
00301   }
00302   vertexArray.swap(new_vertex_array);
00303   vertexHandlesArray.swap(new_vtx_handle_array);
00304 
00305   // Step 7: Permute the elements and vertex indices for the elements
00306   std::vector<MsqMeshEntity> new_elem_array(num_elem);
00307   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> new_elem_handle_array(num_elem);
00308   for (i = 0; i < num_elem; ++i) {
00309     assert( i < elementArray.size() );
00310     size_t  vert_count = elementArray[i].node_count();
00311     size_t* conn_array = elementArray[i].get_vertex_index_array();
00312     for (j = 0; j < vert_count; ++j) {
00313       conn_array[j] = vertex_map[conn_array[j]];
00314     }
00315 
00316     size_t new_idx = element_map[i];
00317     assert(new_idx < num_elem);
00318     new_elem_array[new_idx] = elementArray[i];
00319     new_elem_handle_array[new_idx] = elementHandlesArray[i];
00320   }
00321   elementArray.swap( new_elem_array );
00322   elementHandlesArray.swap( new_elem_handle_array );
00323 
00324   // Step 8: Clear no-longer-valid vertex-to-element adjacency info.
00325   if (vertAdjacencyOffsets.size()) {
00326     vertAdjacencyOffsets.clear();
00327     vertAdjacencyArray.clear();
00328     generate_vertex_to_element_data();
00329   }
00330   
00331   notify_new_patch( ); 
00332 }
00333 
00334 
00355 void PatchData::move_free_vertices_constrained(Vector3D dk[], size_t nb_vtx,
00356                                                double step_size, MsqError &err)
00357 {
00358   if (nb_vtx != num_free_vertices())
00359   {
00360     MSQ_SETERR(err)("The directional vector must be of length numVertices.",
00361                     MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00362     return;
00363   }
00364   
00365   size_t i;
00366   for (i = 0; i < num_free_vertices(); ++i) 
00367   {
00368     vertexArray[i] += (step_size * dk[i]);
00369     snap_vertex_to_domain(i, err);
00370     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00371   }
00372   
00373   if (numSlaveVertices) {
00374     update_slave_node_coordinates( err );
00375     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00376   }
00377 }
00378 
00379 
00395 void PatchData::set_free_vertices_constrained(PatchDataVerticesMemento* memento,
00396                                               Vector3D dk[],
00397                                               size_t nb_vtx,
00398                                               double step_size,
00399                                               MsqError &err)
00400 {
00401   if (memento->originator != this || nb_vtx != num_free_vertices())
00402   {
00403     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00404     return;
00405   }
00406   
00407   size_t i;
00408   for (i = 0; i < num_free_vertices(); ++i) 
00409   {
00410     vertexArray[i] = memento->vertices[i] + (step_size * dk[i]);
00411     snap_vertex_to_domain(i, err);
00412     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00413   }
00414   
00415   if (numSlaveVertices) {
00416     update_slave_node_coordinates( err );
00417     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00418   }
00419   
00420     // Checks that moving direction is zero for fixed vertices.
00421   if (MSQ_DBG(3)) {
00422   for (i = 0; i < num_nodes(); ++i) {
00423     if (dk[i].length_squared() != 0.0)
00424     {
00425       MSQ_DBGOUT(3) << "dk["<<i<<"]: " << dk[i] << endl;
00426       MSQ_DBGOUT(3) << "moving a fixed vertex." << endl;
00427     }
00428   }     
00429   }
00430 }
00431 
00432 static void project_to_plane( Vector3D& vect, const Vector3D& norm )
00433 {
00434   double len_sqr = norm % norm;
00435   if (len_sqr > DBL_EPSILON) 
00436     vect -= norm * ((norm % vect) / len_sqr);
00437 }
00438 
00439 void PatchData::project_gradient( std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient, MsqError& err )
00440 {
00441   if (!domain_set())
00442     return;
00443   
00444   if (gradient.size() != num_free_vertices()) {
00445     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::INVALID_ARG );
00446     return;
00447   }
00448   
00449   if (normalData.empty()) {
00450     update_cached_normals( err );
00451     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00452   }
00453   
00454   Vector3D norm;
00455   for (size_t i= 0; i < num_free_vertices(); ++i) {
00456     if (vertexNormalIndices.empty()) {  // whole mesh on single 2D domain
00457       norm = normalData[i];
00458       project_to_plane( gradient[i], norm );
00459     }
00460     else if (vertexDomainDOF[i] == 2) { // vertex on surface
00461       norm = normalData[vertexNormalIndices[i]];
00462       project_to_plane( gradient[i], norm );
00463     }
00464     else if (vertexDomainDOF[i] == 1) {
00465       size_t j, num_elem;
00466       const size_t* elems = get_vertex_element_adjacencies( i, num_elem, err );
00467       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00468       for (j = 0; j < num_elem; ++j) {
00469         if (2 == TopologyInfo::dimension(element_by_index(elems[j]).get_element_type())) {
00470           norm = vertexArray[i];
00471           get_domain()->element_normal_at( elementHandlesArray[elems[j]], norm );
00472           project_to_plane( gradient[i], norm );
00473         }
00474       }
00475     }
00476   }
00477 }
00478 
00479 
00489 double PatchData::get_max_vertex_movement_squared(PatchDataVerticesMemento*
00490                                                   memento,
00491                                                   MsqError &err)
00492 {
00493   double max_dist = 0.0;
00494   for (size_t i = 0; i < memento->vertices.size(); ++i) {
00495     double temp_dist = (vertexArray[i] - memento->vertices[i]).length_squared();
00496     if (temp_dist > max_dist)
00497       max_dist = temp_dist;
00498   }
00499   return max_dist;
00500 }

00534 void PatchData::get_element_vertex_coordinates(
00535   size_t elem_index,
00536   std::vector<Vector3D> &coords,
00537   MsqError& /*err*/)
00538 {
00539     // Check index
00540   if (elem_index >= num_elements())
00541     return;
00542   
00543     // Ask the element for its vertex indices
00544   assert( elem_index < elementArray.size() );
00545   const size_t *vertex_indices = elementArray[elem_index].get_vertex_index_array();
00546   
00547     // Get the coords for each indicated vertex
00548   size_t num_verts = elementArray[elem_index].vertex_count();
00549   coords.reserve(coords.size() + num_verts);
00550   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_verts; i++)
00551     coords.push_back(Vector3D(vertexArray[vertex_indices[i]]));
00552 }

00559 void PatchData::get_element_vertex_indices(
00560   size_t elem_index,
00561   std::vector<size_t> &vertex_indices,
00562   MsqError& /*err*/)
00563 {
00564     // Ask the element for its vertex indices
00565   assert( elem_index < elementArray.size() );
00566   elementArray[elem_index].get_vertex_indices(vertex_indices);
00567 }

00569 
00570 void PatchData::get_vertex_element_indices(size_t vertex_index,
00571                                            std::vector<size_t> &elem_indices,
00572                                            MsqError &err) 
00573 {
00574   size_t count;
00575   const size_t *ptr;
00576   ptr = get_vertex_element_adjacencies( vertex_index, count, err );
00577   elem_indices.resize( count );
00578   std::copy( ptr, ptr + count, elem_indices.begin() );
00579 }
00580 
00581 void PatchData::get_vertex_element_indices(size_t vertex_index,
00582                                            unsigned element_dimension,
00583                                            std::vector<size_t> &elem_indices,
00584                                            MsqError &err) 
00585 {
00586   elem_indices.clear();
00587   size_t count;
00588   const size_t *ptr;
00589   ptr = get_vertex_element_adjacencies( vertex_index, count, err );
00590   for (const size_t* const end = ptr + count; ptr != end; ++ptr)
00591   {
00592     assert(*ptr < elementArray.size());
00593     const EntityTopology type = elementArray[*ptr].get_element_type();
00594     const unsigned dim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00595     if (dim == element_dimension) 
00596       elem_indices.push_back( *ptr );
00597   }
00598 }
00599 
00600 const size_t* PatchData::get_vertex_element_adjacencies( size_t vertex_index,
00601                                                          size_t& array_len_out,
00602                                                          MsqError& err )
00603 {
00604     // Make sure we've got the data
00605   if (vertAdjacencyArray.empty())
00606   {
00607     generate_vertex_to_element_data();
00608   }
00609   
00610   const size_t begin = vertAdjacencyOffsets[vertex_index];
00611   const size_t end = vertAdjacencyOffsets[vertex_index+1];
00612   array_len_out = end - begin;
00613   return &vertAdjacencyArray[begin];
00614 }
00615 
00616 
00625 void PatchData::get_adjacent_vertex_indices(size_t vertex_index,
00626                                             std::vector<size_t> &vert_indices,
00627                                             MsqError &err) const
00628 {
00629   bitMap.clear();
00630   bitMap.resize( num_nodes(), false );
00631   
00632   const size_t *conn;
00633   size_t conn_idx, curr_vtx_idx;
00634   const unsigned* adj;
00635   unsigned num_adj, i;
00636   std::vector<MsqMeshEntity>::const_iterator e;
00637   for (e = elementArray.begin(); e != elementArray.end(); ++e) {
00638     conn = e->get_vertex_index_array();
00639     conn_idx = std::find( conn, conn + e->node_count(), vertex_index ) - conn;
00640     if (conn_idx == e->node_count())
00641       continue;
00642     
00643       // If a higher-order node, return corners of side/face
00644       // that node is in the center of.
00645     EntityTopology type = e->get_element_type();
00646     if (conn_idx >= TopologyInfo::corners(type) && type != POLYGON ) {
00647       unsigned dim, id;
00648       TopologyInfo::side_from_higher_order( type, e->node_count(), conn_idx,
00649                                             dim, id, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00650       adj = TopologyInfo::side_vertices( type, dim, id, num_adj );
00651     }
00652     else {
00653       EntityTopology topo = e->get_element_type();
00654       if (topo == POLYGON)
00655       {
00656         unsigned number_of_nodes = e->node_count();
00657         num_adj = 2;                      // always 2 for a polygon
00658         unsigned vert_adj[2];
00659         vert_adj[0] = (conn_idx+1)%number_of_nodes;
00660         vert_adj[1] = (conn_idx + number_of_nodes-1)%number_of_nodes;
00661         for (i = 0; i < num_adj; ++i) 
00662         {
00663           curr_vtx_idx = conn[ vert_adj[i] ]; // get index into patch vertex list
00664           if (!bitMap[curr_vtx_idx]) 
00665           {
00666             vert_indices.push_back( curr_vtx_idx );
00667             bitMap[curr_vtx_idx] = true;  
00668           }
00669         }
00670       }
00671       else
00672       {
00673         adj = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( topo, conn_idx, num_adj );
00674         for (i = 0; i < num_adj; ++i) 
00675         {
00676           curr_vtx_idx = conn[ adj[i] ]; // get index into patch vertex list
00677           if (!bitMap[curr_vtx_idx]) 
00678           {
00679             vert_indices.push_back( curr_vtx_idx );
00680             bitMap[curr_vtx_idx] = true;
00681           }
00682         }
00683       }
00684     }
00685   }
00686 }
00687 
00699 void PatchData::get_adjacent_entities_via_n_dim(int n, size_t ent_ind,
00700                                                 std::vector<size_t> &adj_ents,
00701                                                 MsqError &err)
00702 {
00703   //reset the vector
00704   adj_ents.clear();
00705     //vertices of this entity (given by ent_ind)
00706   vector<size_t> verts;
00707     //vector to store elements attached to the vertices in verts
00708   vector<size_t> elem_on_vert[MSQ_MAX_NUM_VERT_PER_ENT];
00709     //length of above vectos
00710   int length_elem_on_vert[MSQ_MAX_NUM_VERT_PER_ENT];
00711     //get verts on this element
00712   get_element_vertex_indices(ent_ind, verts, err);
00713   int num_vert=verts.size();
00714   int i=0;
00715   int j=0;
00716   for(i=0;i<num_vert;++i){
00717       //get elements on the vertices in verts and the number of vertices
00718     get_vertex_element_indices(verts[i],elem_on_vert[i],err);
00719     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00720     length_elem_on_vert[i]=elem_on_vert[i].size();
00721   }
00722     //this_ent is the index for an entity which is a candidate to be placed
00723     //into adj_ents
00724   size_t this_ent;
00725     //num of times this_ent has been found in the vectors of entity indices
00726   int counter=0;
00727   i = 0;
00728     //loop of each vert on ent_ind
00729   while(i<num_vert){
00730       //loop over each ent connected to vert
00731     j=0;
00732     while(j<length_elem_on_vert[i]){
00733         //get candidate element
00734       this_ent=elem_on_vert[i][j];
00735         //if we haven't already consider this ent
00736       if(this_ent!=ent_ind){
00737           //if this_ent occurred earlier we would have already considered it
00738           //so start at i and j+1
00739         int k1=i;
00740         int k2=j+1;
00741           //this_ent has occured once so far
00742         counter=1;
00743           //while k1 < num_vert
00744         while(k1<num_vert){
00745             //loop over entries in the elem on vert vector
00746           while(k2<length_elem_on_vert[k1]){
00747               //if it matches this_ent
00748             if(elem_on_vert[k1][k2]==this_ent){
00749                 //mark it as 'seen', by making it the same as ent_ind
00750                 //i.e., the entity  passed to us.
00751               elem_on_vert[k1][k2]=ent_ind;
00752               ++counter;
00753                 //do not look at remaining elems in this vector
00754               k2+=length_elem_on_vert[k1];
00755             }
00756             else
00757               ++k2;
00758           }
00759           ++k1;
00760           k2=0;
00761           
00762         }
00763           //if this_ent occured enough times and isn't ent_ind
00764         if(counter>n && this_ent!=ent_ind){
00765           adj_ents.push_back(this_ent);
00766         }
00767       }
00768       ++j;
00769     }
00770     ++i;
00771   }
00772 }
00773 
00774     
00775   
00776 
00777 
00784 void PatchData::update_mesh(MsqError &err, const TagHandle* tag)
00785 {
00786   if (!myMesh) {
00787     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot update mesh on temporary patch.\n", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00788     return;
00789   }
00790   
00791   const size_t not_fixed = numFreeVertices + numSlaveVertices;
00792   if (tag) {
00793     for (size_t i = 0; i < not_fixed; ++i) {
00794       myMesh->tag_set_vertex_data( *tag, 1, &vertexHandlesArray[i], 
00795                                    vertexArray[i].to_array(), err );
00796                                    MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00797     }
00798   }
00799   else {
00800     for (size_t i = 0; i < not_fixed; ++i) {
00801       myMesh->vertex_set_coordinates( vertexHandlesArray[i],
00802                                       vertexArray[i],
00803                                       err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00804     }      
00805   }
00806   
00807   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertexArray.size(); ++i)
00808   {
00809     myMesh->vertex_set_byte( vertexHandlesArray[i],
00810                              vertexArray[i].get_flags(),
00811                              err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00812   }
00813 }
00814 
00815 void PatchData::update_slave_node_coordinates( MsqError& err )
00816 {
00817     // update slave vertices
00818   if (0 == num_slave_vertices())
00819     return;
00820 
00821     // Set a mark on every slave vertex.  We'll clear the marks as we
00822     // set the vertex coordinates.  This way we can check that all 
00823     // vertices got updated.
00824   const size_t vert_end = num_free_vertices() + num_slave_vertices();
00825   for (size_t i = num_free_vertices(); i < vert_end; ++i)
00826     vertexArray[i].flags() |= MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK;
00827   
00828     // For each element, calculate slave vertex coordinates from
00829     // mapping function.
00830   const int ARR_SIZE = 27;
00831   double coeff[ARR_SIZE];
00832   size_t index[ARR_SIZE];
00833   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elements(); ++i) {
00834     MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index(i);
00835     const int num_corner = elem.vertex_count();
00836     const int num_node = elem.node_count();
00837     assert(num_node < ARR_SIZE);
00838   
00839     const EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00840     const MappingFunction* const mf = get_mapping_function( type );
00841     if (0 == mf || num_node == num_corner)
00842       continue;
00843       
00844     const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00845 
00846       // for each higher-order non-slave node, set bit indicating
00847       // that mapping function is a function of the non-slave node
00848       // coordinates
00849     NodeSet ho_bits = non_slave_node_set( i );
00850     
00851       // for each higher-order slave node
00852     for (int k = num_corner; k < num_node; ++k) {
00853       if (!is_vertex_slave(conn[k]))
00854         continue;
00855       
00856         // check if we already did this one for an adjacent element
00857       MsqVertex& vert = vertexArray[conn[k]];
00858       if (!vert.is_flag_set(MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK))
00859         continue;
00860      
00861         // what is this node a mid node of (i.e. face 1, edge 2, etc.)
00862       Sample loc = TopologyInfo::sample_from_node( type, elem.node_count(), 
00863                                                    k, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00864       
00865         // evaluate mapping function at logical loction of HO node.
00866       size_t num_coeff;
00867       mf->coefficients( loc, ho_bits, coeff, index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00868       mf->convert_connectivity_indices( num_node, index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00869       
00870         // calulate new coordinates for slave node
00871       assert( num_coeff > 0 );
00872       vert = coeff[0] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[0]] );
00873       for (size_t j = 1; j < num_coeff; ++j)
00874         vert += coeff[j] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[j]] );
00875       
00876         // clear mark
00877       vert.flags() &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK;
00878     }
00879   }
00880   
00881     // make sure we set the coordinates for every slave node
00882   for (size_t i = num_free_vertices(); i < vert_end; ++i) {
00883     if (vertex_by_index(i).is_flag_set(MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK)) {
00884       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_MESH, 
00885        "No element with mapping function adjacent to slave vertex %lu (%lu)\n",
00886        (unsigned long)i, (unsigned long)get_vertex_handles_array()[i]);
00887         // make sure we finish with all marks cleared
00888       vertexArray[i].flags() &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK;
00889     }
00890   }
00891   
00892     // snap vertices to domain
00893   if (domain_set()) {
00894     for (size_t i = num_free_vertices(); i < vert_end; ++i) {
00895       snap_vertex_to_domain(i, err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00896     }
00897   } 
00898 }
00899 
00900 void PatchData::update_slave_node_coordinates( const size_t* elements,
00901                                                size_t num_elems,
00902                                                MsqError& err )
00903 {
00904     // update slave vertices
00905   if (0 == num_slave_vertices())
00906     return;
00907   
00908     // set a mark on each vertex so we don't update shared
00909     // vertices more than once.
00910   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elems; ++i) {
00911     MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index(elements[i]);
00912     const int num_corner = elem.vertex_count();
00913     const int num_node = elem.node_count();
00914     const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00915     for (int j = num_corner; j < num_node; ++j)
00916       vertexArray[conn[j]].flags() |= MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK;
00917   }
00918   
00919     // For each element, calculate slave vertex coordinates from
00920     // mapping function.
00921   const int ARR_SIZE = 27;
00922   double coeff[ARR_SIZE];
00923   size_t index[ARR_SIZE];
00924   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elems; ++i) {
00925     MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index(elements[i]);
00926     const int num_corner = elem.vertex_count();
00927     const int num_node = elem.node_count();
00928     assert(num_node < ARR_SIZE);
00929   
00930     const EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00931     const MappingFunction* const mf = get_mapping_function( type );
00932     if (0 == mf || num_node == num_corner)
00933       continue;
00934       
00935     const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00936 
00937       // for each higher-order non-slave node, set bit indicating
00938       // that mapping function is a function of the non-slave node
00939       // coordinates
00940     NodeSet ho_bits = non_slave_node_set( i );
00941     
00942       // for each higher-order slave node
00943     for (int k = num_corner; k < num_node; ++k) {
00944       if (!is_vertex_slave(conn[k]))
00945         continue;
00946       
00947         // check if we already did this one for an adjacent element
00948       MsqVertex& vert = vertexArray[conn[k]];
00949       if (!vert.is_flag_set(MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK))
00950         continue;
00951      
00952         // what is this node a mid node of (i.e. face 1, edge 2, etc.)
00953       Sample loc = TopologyInfo::sample_from_node( type, elem.node_count(), 
00954                                                    k, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00955       
00956         // evaluate mapping function at logical loction of HO node.
00957       size_t num_coeff;
00958       mf->coefficients( loc, ho_bits, coeff, index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00959       mf->convert_connectivity_indices( num_node, index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00960       
00961         // calulate new coordinates for slave node
00962       assert( num_coeff > 0 );
00963       vert = coeff[0] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[0]] );
00964       for (size_t j = 1; j < num_coeff; ++j)
00965         vert += coeff[j] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[j]] );
00966 
00967         // snap vertices to domain
00968       if (domain_set()) {
00969         snap_vertex_to_domain(conn[k], err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00970       }
00971       
00972         // clear mark
00973       vert.flags() &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK;
00974     }
00975   }
00976 }
00977 
00978 void PatchData::generate_vertex_to_element_data()
00979 {
00980   MSQ_FUNCTION_TIMER( "PatchData::generate_vertex_to_element_data" );
00981   
00982     // Skip if data already exists
00983   if (!vertAdjacencyArray.empty())
00984     return;
00985     
00986     // Skip if patch is empty
00987   if (0 == num_nodes())
00988     return;
00989   
00990     // Allocate offset array
00991   vertAdjacencyOffsets.clear();
00992   vertAdjacencyOffsets.resize( num_nodes() + 1, 0 );
00993   
00994     // Temporarily use offsets array to hold per-vertex element count
00995   std::vector<MsqMeshEntity>::iterator elem_iter;
00996   const std::vector<MsqMeshEntity>::iterator elem_end = elementArray.end();
00997   for (elem_iter = elementArray.begin(); elem_iter != elem_end; ++elem_iter)
00998   {
00999     size_t* conn_iter = elem_iter->get_vertex_index_array();
01000     const size_t* conn_end = conn_iter + elem_iter->node_count();
01001     for ( ; conn_iter != conn_end; ++conn_iter )
01002       ++vertAdjacencyOffsets[*conn_iter];
01003   }
01004   
01005     // Convert counts to end indices.
01006     // When done, vertAdjacencyOffsets will contain, for each vertex,
01007     // one more than the *last* index for that vertex's data in the
01008     // adjacency array.  This is *not* the final state for this data.
01009     // See comments for next loop.
01010   std::vector<size_t>::iterator off_iter = vertAdjacencyOffsets.begin();
01011   const std::vector<size_t>::iterator off_end = vertAdjacencyOffsets.end();
01012   size_t prev = *off_iter;
01013   ++off_iter;
01014   for ( ; off_iter != off_end; ++off_iter)
01015   {
01016     prev += *off_iter;
01017     *off_iter = prev;
01018   }
01019   
01020     // Allocate space for element numbers
01021   const size_t num_vert_uses = vertAdjacencyOffsets[num_nodes()-1];
01022   assert( num_vert_uses == elemConnectivityArray.size() );
01023   vertAdjacencyArray.resize( num_vert_uses );
01024   
01025     // Fill vertAdjacencyArray, using the indices in vertAdjacencyOffsets
01026     // as the location to insert the next element number in
01027     // vertAdjacencyArray.  When done, vertAdjacenyOffsets will contain
01028     // the start index for each vertex, rather than one past the last
01029     // index.
01030   for (size_t i = 0; i < elementArray.size(); ++i)
01031   {
01032     size_t* conn_iter = elementArray[i].get_vertex_index_array();
01033     const size_t* conn_end = conn_iter + elementArray[i].node_count();
01034     for ( ; conn_iter != conn_end; ++conn_iter )
01035     {
01036       const size_t array_index = --vertAdjacencyOffsets[*conn_iter];
01037       vertAdjacencyArray[array_index] = i;
01038     }
01039   }
01040   
01041     // Last entry should be number of vertex uses (one past the
01042     // last index of the last vertex.)
01043   vertAdjacencyOffsets[num_nodes()] = num_vert_uses;
01044 }
01045 
01046 void PatchData::get_subpatch(size_t center_vertex_index,
01047                              unsigned num_adj_elem_layers,
01048                              PatchData &subpatch,
01049                              MsqError &err)
01050 {
01051   unsigned i;
01052 
01053     // Make sure we're in range
01054   if (center_vertex_index >= num_free_vertices())
01055   {
01056     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid index for center vertex",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
01057     return;
01058   }
01059   
01060     // Notify any observers of the existing subpatch that the mesh 
01061     // in the patch is to be changed.
01062   subpatch.notify_new_patch( ); 
01063 
01064     // Get list of vertices and elements in subpatch.
01065     // Ultimately, end up with arrays of unique, sorted indices.
01066     // It is important that the vertex indices be sorted so later
01067     // a reverse lookup can be done using a binary search (std::lower_bound).
01068   std::vector<size_t> elements, vertices, offsets;
01069   vertices.push_back( center_vertex_index );
01070   for (i = 0; i < num_adj_elem_layers; ++i)
01071   {
01072     elements.clear();
01073     for (unsigned v = 0; v < vertices.size(); ++v)
01074     {
01075       size_t num_elem;
01076       const size_t* vert_elems = get_vertex_element_adjacencies( vertices[v], num_elem, err );
01077       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01078       elements.insert( elements.end(), vert_elems, vert_elems + num_elem );
01079     }
01080     std::sort( elements.begin(), elements.end() );
01081     elements.erase( std::unique( elements.begin(), elements.end() ), elements.end() );
01082     
01083     vertices.clear();
01084     for (unsigned e = 0; e < elements.size(); ++e)
01085     {
01086       MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index( elements[e] );
01087       size_t num_vert = elem.node_count();
01088       const size_t* elem_verts = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
01089       vertices.insert( vertices.end(), elem_verts, elem_verts + num_vert );
01090     }
01091     std::sort( vertices.begin(), vertices.end() );
01092     vertices.erase( std::unique( vertices.begin(), vertices.end() ), vertices.end() );
01093   }
01094   
01095     // Allocate space for element connectivity info.
01096   size_t num_vert_uses = 0;
01097   for (i = 0; i < elements.size(); ++i)
01098     num_vert_uses += element_by_index( elements[i] ).node_count();
01099   subpatch.elementArray.resize( elements.size() );
01100   subpatch.elementHandlesArray.resize( elements.size() );
01101   subpatch.elemConnectivityArray.resize( num_vert_uses );
01102   offsets.resize( elements.size() + 1 );
01103   
01104     // Construct element connectivity data in new patch,
01105     // and copy element type into new patch
01106   size_t curr_offset = 0;
01107   for (i = 0; i < elements.size(); ++i)
01108   {
01109     MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index( elements[i] );
01110     assert( i < elementArray.size() );
01111     subpatch.elementArray[i].set_element_type( elem.get_element_type() );
01112     subpatch.elementHandlesArray[i] = elementHandlesArray[elements[i]];
01113     const size_t* verts = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
01114     offsets[i] = curr_offset;
01115     for (unsigned j = 0; j < elem.node_count(); ++j)
01116     {
01117       subpatch.elemConnectivityArray[curr_offset++] = 
01118         std::lower_bound( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), verts[j] )
01119         - vertices.begin();
01120     }
01121   }
01122   offsets[i] = curr_offset;
01123   
01124     // Store index in this patch in vertex handle array of subpatch
01125     // so we can determine how vertices were reordered when setting
01126     // vertex coordinates.
01127   assert(sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(void*));
01128   subpatch.vertexHandlesArray.resize( vertices.size() );
01129   size_t* vert_handles = reinterpret_cast<size_t*>(&subpatch.vertexHandlesArray[0]);
01130   std::copy( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), vert_handles );
01131   
01132     // All vertices except vertex at center_vertex_index are fixed.
01133   subpatch.byteArray.resize( vertices.size() );
01134   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i) {
01135     if (vertices[i] == center_vertex_index)
01136       subpatch.byteArray[i] = vertexArray[vertices[i]].get_flags() & ~MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01137     else
01138       subpatch.byteArray[i] = vertexArray[vertices[i]].get_flags() | MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01139   }
01140   
01141     // Re-order vertices and initialize other data in subpatch
01142   subpatch.initialize_data( arrptr(offsets), &subpatch.byteArray[0], err ); 
01143   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01144   
01145     // Copy vertex data into subpatch.  subpatch.vertexHandlesArray contains
01146     // the indices into this PatchData for each vertex, as reordered by the
01147     // call to initialize_data.
01148   subpatch.vertexArray.resize( vertices.size() );
01149   for (i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i)
01150   {
01151     size_t vert_index = (size_t)(subpatch.vertexHandlesArray[i]);
01152     vertices[i] = vert_index;
01153     subpatch.vertexHandlesArray[i] = vertexHandlesArray[vert_index];
01154     subpatch.vertexArray[i] = vertexArray[vert_index];
01155     subpatch.vertexArray[i].flags() = subpatch.byteArray[i];
01156   }
01157 
01158   subpatch.myMesh = myMesh;
01159   subpatch.myDomain = myDomain;
01160   subpatch.mSettings = mSettings;
01161   
01162   notify_sub_patch( subpatch, arrptr(vertices), elements.empty() ? 0 : arrptr(elements), err ); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
01163 }
01164 
01168 void PatchData::snap_vertex_to_domain(size_t vertex_index, MsqError &err)
01169 {
01170   if (domain_set())
01171   {
01172       // if not doing normal caching or vertex is not on a single surface
01173     if (normalData.empty())
01174     {
01175       get_domain()->snap_to( vertexHandlesArray[vertex_index],
01176                              vertexArray[vertex_index] );
01177     }
01178       // entire domain is 2-D (all vertices have a single normal)
01179     else if (vertexNormalIndices.empty())
01180     {
01181       get_domain()->closest_point( vertexHandlesArray[vertex_index],
01182                                    Vector3D(vertexArray[vertex_index]),
01183                                    vertexArray[vertex_index],
01184                                    normalData[vertex_index],
01185                                    err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01186     }
01187     else if (vertexNormalIndices[vertex_index] < normalData.size()) 
01188     { // vertex has a unique normal
01189       get_domain()->closest_point( vertexHandlesArray[vertex_index],
01190                                    Vector3D(vertexArray[vertex_index]),
01191                                    vertexArray[vertex_index],
01192                                    normalData[vertexNormalIndices[vertex_index]],
01193                                    err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01194     }
01195     else 
01196     { // vertex has multiple normals
01197       get_domain()->snap_to( vertexHandlesArray[vertex_index],
01198                              vertexArray[vertex_index] );
01199     }
01200   }
01201 }
01202 
01203 
01204 void PatchData::update_cached_normals( MsqError& err )
01205 {
01206   size_t i;
01207   
01208   MeshDomain* domain = get_domain();
01209   if (!domain)
01210   {
01211     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No domain constraint set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01212     return;
01213   }
01214   
01215     // Determine which vertices lie on surfaces
01216   vertexDomainDOF.resize( num_nodes() );
01217   domain->domain_DoF( arrptr(vertexHandlesArray), arrptr(vertexDomainDOF), num_nodes(), err );
01218   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01219   
01220     // Count how many vertices have a single normal
01221   // Sun doesn't support partial template specialization, so can't use std::count
01222   //size_t n = std::count( vertexDomainDOF.begin(), vertexDomainDOF.end(), 2 );
01223   size_t n = 0;
01224   std::vector<unsigned short>::iterator k;
01225   for ( k = vertexDomainDOF.begin(); k != vertexDomainDOF.end(); ++k)
01226     if (*k == 2)
01227       ++n;
01228   
01229   normalData.resize( n );
01230   
01231     // If all vertices are on a surface, pass in the existing handles array
01232     // and store a single normal per vertex.
01233   if (n == num_nodes())
01234   {
01235     std::copy( vertexArray.begin(), vertexArray.end(), normalData.begin() );
01236     domain->vertex_normal_at( arrptr(vertexHandlesArray), arrptr(normalData), num_nodes(), err );
01237     vertexNormalIndices.clear();
01238     vertexDomainDOF.clear();
01239     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01240   }
01241   else 
01242   {
01243     vertexNormalIndices.resize( num_nodes() );
01244     size_t nn = 0;
01245     for (i = 0; i < num_nodes(); ++i) {
01246       if (vertexDomainDOF[i] == 2) {
01247         normalData[nn] = vertexArray[i];
01248         domain->vertex_normal_at( vertexHandlesArray[i], normalData[nn] );
01249         vertexNormalIndices[i] = nn;
01250         ++nn;
01251       }
01252       else {
01253         vertexNormalIndices[i] = n+1;
01254       }
01255     }
01256     assert( nn == n );
01257   }
01258 }
01259 
01260 
01261 void PatchData::get_domain_normal_at_element(size_t elem_index,
01262                                              Vector3D &surf_norm,
01263                                              MsqError &err)
01264 {
01265     // check if element as a mid-face node
01266   const MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index( elem_index );
01267   const int mid_node = TopologyInfo::higher_order_from_side( 
01268                                                elem.get_element_type(),
01269                                                elem.node_count(),
01270                                                2, 0, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01271     // if we have the mid-element vertex, get cached normal for it
01272   if (mid_node > 0) {
01273       get_domain_normal_at_vertex( elem.get_vertex_index_array()[mid_node],
01274                                    elementHandlesArray[elem_index],
01275                                    surf_norm, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01276   }
01277     // otherwise query domain for normal at element centroid
01278   else if(domain_set()) {    
01279     assert(elem_index < elementArray.size());
01280     elementArray[elem_index].get_centroid(surf_norm, *this, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01281     get_domain()->element_normal_at( elementHandlesArray[elem_index], surf_norm );
01282   }
01283   else
01284     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No domain constraint set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01285 }
01286 
01287 
01288 void PatchData::get_domain_normal_at_mid_edge( size_t elem_index,
01289                                                unsigned edge_num,
01290                                                Vector3D& normal,
01291                                                MsqError& err )
01292 {
01293     // check if element as a mid-edge node
01294   const MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index( elem_index );
01295   const int mid_node = TopologyInfo::higher_order_from_side( 
01296                                                elem.get_element_type(),
01297                                                elem.node_count(),
01298                                                1, edge_num, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01299     // if we have the mid-edge vertex, get cached normal for it
01300   if (mid_node > 0) {
01301     get_domain_normal_at_vertex( elem.get_vertex_index_array()[mid_node],
01302                                  elementHandlesArray[elem_index],
01303                                  normal, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01304   }
01305     // otherwise query domain for normal at center of edge
01306   else if (domain_set()) {
01307     const unsigned* edge = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( elem.get_element_type(),
01308                                                         edge_num, err );
01309                                                         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01310     const MsqVertex& v1 = vertex_by_index( elem.get_vertex_index_array()[edge[0]] );
01311     const MsqVertex& v2 = vertex_by_index( elem.get_vertex_index_array()[edge[1]] );
01312     normal = 0.5 * (v1 + v2);
01313     get_domain()->element_normal_at( elementHandlesArray[elem_index], normal );
01314   
01315   }
01316   else {
01317     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No domain constraint set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01318     return;
01319   }
01320 }
01321 
01322 void PatchData::get_domain_normals_at_corners( size_t elem_index,
01323                                                Vector3D normals_out[],
01324                                                MsqError& err ) 
01325 {
01326   if (!domain_set())
01327   {
01328     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No domain constraint set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01329     return;
01330   }
01331   
01332   assert(elem_index < elementArray.size());
01333   if (2 != TopologyInfo::dimension( elementArray[elem_index].get_element_type() ))
01334   {
01335     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Attempt to get corners of non-surface element", MsqError::INVALID_ARG );
01336     return;
01337   }
01338   
01339   if (normalData.empty())
01340   {
01341     update_cached_normals( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01342   }
01343   
01344   MsqMeshEntity& elem = elementArray[elem_index];
01345   const unsigned count = elem.vertex_count();
01346   const size_t* const vertex_indices = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
01347   for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
01348   {
01349     const size_t v = vertex_indices[i];
01350     if (vertexNormalIndices.empty())
01351     {
01352       normals_out[i] = normalData[v];
01353     }
01354     else if(vertexNormalIndices[v] < normalData.size())
01355     {
01356       normals_out[i] = normalData[vertexNormalIndices[v]];
01357     }
01358     else
01359     {
01360       normals_out[i] = vertexArray[v];
01361       get_domain()->element_normal_at( elementHandlesArray[elem_index], normals_out[i] );
01362     }
01363   }
01364 }  
01365 
01366 void PatchData::get_domain_normal_at_vertex( size_t vert_index,
01367                                              Mesh::EntityHandle handle,
01368                                              Vector3D& normal,
01369                                              MsqError& err )
01370 {
01371   if (!domain_set())
01372   {
01373     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No domain constraint set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01374     return;
01375   }
01376 
01377   
01378   if (normalData.empty())
01379   {
01380     update_cached_normals( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01381   }
01382   
01383   if (vertexNormalIndices.empty())
01384   {
01385     normal = normalData[vert_index];
01386   }
01387   else if(vertexNormalIndices[vert_index] < normalData.size())
01388   {
01389     normal = normalData[vertexNormalIndices[vert_index]];
01390   }
01391   else
01392   {
01393     normal = vertexArray[vert_index];
01394     get_domain()->element_normal_at( handle, normal );
01395   }
01396 }
01397 
01398 void PatchData::get_domain_normal_at_corner( size_t elem_index,
01399                                              unsigned corner,
01400                                              Vector3D& normal,
01401                                              MsqError& err ) 
01402 {
01403   assert(elem_index < elementArray.size());
01404   if (2 != TopologyInfo::dimension( elementArray[elem_index].get_element_type() ))
01405   {
01406     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Attempt to get corners of non-surface element", MsqError::INVALID_ARG );
01407     return;
01408   }
01409 
01410   MsqMeshEntity& elem = elementArray[elem_index];
01411   const size_t* const vertex_indices = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
01412   get_domain_normal_at_vertex( vertex_indices[corner],
01413                                elementHandlesArray[elem_index],
01414                                normal, err );
01415   MSQ_CHKERR(err);
01416 }
01417   
01418 
01419 void PatchData::set_mesh(Mesh* ms)        
01420 { 
01421   myMesh = ms; 
01422     // observers should treat this the same as if the
01423     // instance of this object wzs being deleted.
01424   notify_patch_destroyed();
01425 }
01426 
01427 void PatchData::set_domain(MeshDomain* d) 
01428 { 
01429   myDomain = d;
01430   
01431     // clear all cached data from the previous domain
01432   vertexNormalIndices.clear();
01433   normalData.clear();
01434   //vertexDomainDOF.clear();
01435 
01436     // observers should treat this the same as if the
01437     // instance of this object wzs being deleted.
01438   notify_patch_destroyed();
01439 }
01440 
01441 static int width( double d )
01442 {
01443   if (d == 0.0)
01444     return 1;
01445   const int max_precision = 6;
01446   int w = (int)ceil(log10(0.001+fabs(d)));
01447   if (w < 0) 
01448     w = 2 + std::min(max_precision,-w);
01449   if (d < 0.0)
01450     ++w;
01451   return w;
01452 }
01453 static int width( size_t t )
01454   { return t ? (int)ceil(log10((double)(1+t))) : 1; }
01455 static int width( const void* ptr)
01456   { return width((size_t)ptr); }
01457 
01458 ostream& operator<<( ostream& stream, const PatchData& pd )
01459 {
01460    size_t i;
01461    int fw = 5; // width of bit flags
01462    int hw = 6; // width of a handle
01463    int cw = 4; // with of a coordinate value
01464    int iw = 3; // with of an index
01465    int tw = 3; // with of the string name of an element type
01466    int xw = cw, yw = cw, zw = cw;
01467    
01468    for (i = 0; i < pd.num_nodes(); ++i) {
01469      int w = 2+width(pd.vertexHandlesArray[i]);
01470      if (w > hw)
01471        hw = w;
01472      w = width(pd.vertexArray[i].x());
01473      if (w > xw)
01474        xw = w;
01475      w = width(pd.vertexArray[i].y());
01476      if (w > yw)
01477        yw = w;
01478      w = width(pd.vertexArray[i].z());
01479      if (w > zw)
01480        zw = w;
01481    }
01482    for (i = 0; i < pd.num_elements(); ++i) {
01483      int w = 2+width(pd.elementHandlesArray[i]);
01484      if (w > hw)
01485        hw = w;
01486      const char* name = TopologyInfo::short_name(pd.elementArray[i].get_element_type());
01487      if (name && (int)strlen(name) > tw)
01488        tw = strlen(name);
01489    }
01490    if (iw < (int)ceil(log10((double)(1+pd.num_nodes()))))
01491      iw = (int)ceil(log10((double)(1+pd.num_nodes())));
01492    if (iw < (int)ceil(log10((double)(1+pd.num_elements()))))
01493      iw = (int)ceil(log10((double)(1+pd.num_elements())));
01494     
01495    
01496    stream << "Vertices: " << endl;
01497    stream << "Flags: C: culled, F: fixed, S: slave, P: patch vertex, M: marked" << endl;
01498    stream << setw(iw) << "Idx"    << " " 
01499           << setw(hw) << "Handle" << " "
01500           << setw(cw) << "X"      << ","
01501           << setw(cw) << "Y"      << ","
01502           << setw(cw) << "Z"      << " "
01503           << setw(fw) << "Flags"  << " "
01504           <<             "Adj.Elems" << endl
01505           << setw(iw) << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01506           << setw(hw) << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01507           << setw(cw) << setfill('-') << "" << ","
01508           << setw(cw) << setfill('-') << "" << ","
01509           << setw(cw) << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01510           << setw(fw) << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01511           << setfill(' ') << "-------------" << std::endl;
01512    for (i = 0; i < pd.num_nodes(); ++i)
01513    {
01514       stream << setw(iw) << i << " " 
01515              << setw(hw) << pd.vertexHandlesArray[i] << " " 
01516              << setw(cw) << pd.vertexArray[i].x() << ","
01517              << setw(cw) << pd.vertexArray[i].y() << ","
01518              << setw(cw) << pd.vertexArray[i].z() << " ";
01519       if (pd.vertexArray[i].is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_CULLED ))
01520         stream << "C";
01521       else 
01522         stream << " ";
01523       if (pd.vertexArray[i].is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_HARD_FIXED ))
01524         stream << "F";
01525       else 
01526         stream << " ";
01527       if (pd.vertexArray[i].is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT ))
01528         stream << "S";
01529       else 
01530         stream << " ";
01531       if (pd.vertexArray[i].is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED ))
01532         stream << "f";
01533       else 
01534         stream << " ";
01535       if (pd.vertexArray[i].is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK ))
01536         stream << "M";
01537       else 
01538         stream << " ";
01539       
01540       if (pd.vertAdjacencyArray.size())
01541       {
01542         size_t j = pd.vertAdjacencyOffsets[i];
01543         size_t end = pd.vertAdjacencyOffsets[i+1];
01544         if (j != end) 
01545           stream << " " << pd.vertAdjacencyArray[j++];
01546         for ( ; j < end; ++j )
01547           stream << "," << pd.vertAdjacencyArray[j];
01548       }
01549       
01550       stream << endl;
01551    }
01552    
01553    stream << "Elements: " << endl;
01554    stream << setw(iw)   << "Idx"    << " "
01555           << setw(hw)   << "Handle" << " "
01556           << setw(tw+2) << "Type"   << " "
01557           <<             "Connectivity" << std::endl
01558           << setw(iw)   << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01559           << setw(hw)   << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01560           << setw(tw+2) << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01561           << setfill(' ') << "--------------------------" << std::endl;
01562    for (i = 0; i < pd.num_elements(); ++i)
01563    {
01564       EntityTopology type = pd.elementArray[i].get_element_type();
01565       stream << setw(iw) << i << " " 
01566              << setw(hw) << pd.elementHandlesArray[i] << " "
01567              << setw(tw) << TopologyInfo::short_name(type) << left
01568              << setw(2)  << pd.elementArray[i].node_count() << internal << " "
01569              << setw(iw) << pd.elementArray[i].get_vertex_index_array()[0];
01570       for (size_t j = 1; j < pd.elementArray[i].node_count(); ++j)
01571         stream << "," << setw(iw) << pd.elementArray[i].get_vertex_index_array()[j];
01572       stream << endl;
01573    }
01574    stream << endl;
01575    
01576    stream << "Mesh: " << (pd.myMesh?"yes":"no") << endl;
01577    stream << "Domain: " << (pd.myDomain?"yes":"no") << endl;
01578 //   stream << "mType: " << (pd.mType==PatchData::VERTICES_ON_VERTEX_PATCH?"vert-on-vert":
01579 //                           pd.mType==PatchData::ELEMENTS_ON_VERTEX_PATCH?"elem-on-vert":
01580 //                           pd.mType==PatchData::GLOBAL_PATCH?"global":"unknown") << endl;
01581    
01582    if (pd.haveComputedInfos)
01583    {
01584      stream << "ComputedInfos:" << endl;
01585      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA))
01586        stream << "\t MIN_UNSINGED_AREA = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA] << endl;
01587      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA))
01588        stream << "\t MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA] << endl;
01589      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MIN_EDGE_LENGTH))
01590        stream << "\t MIN_EDGE_LENGTH = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MIN_EDGE_LENGTH] << endl;
01591      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MAX_EDGE_LENGTH))
01592        stream << "\t MAX_EDGE_LENGTH = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MAX_EDGE_LENGTH] << endl;
01593      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MINMAX_SIGNED_DET2D))
01594        stream << "\t MINMAX_SIGNED_DET2D = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MINMAX_SIGNED_DET2D] << endl;
01595      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MINMAX_SIGNED_DET3D))
01596        stream << "\t MINMAX_SIGNED_DET3D = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MINMAX_SIGNED_DET3D] << endl;
01597      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::AVERAGE_DET3D))
01598        stream << "\t AVERAGE_DET3D = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::AVERAGE_DET3D] << endl;
01599   }
01600   
01601   return stream << endl;
01602 }
01603 
01604 void print_patch_data( const PatchData& pd )
01605 {
01606   std::cout << pd << std::endl;
01607 }
01608 
01609 void PatchData::enslave_higher_order_nodes( const size_t* elem_offset_array,
01610                                             unsigned char* vertex_flags,
01611                                             MsqError& err ) const
01612 {
01613   for (size_t i = 0; i < elementArray.size(); ++i)
01614   {
01615     size_t start = elem_offset_array[i];
01616     size_t conn_len = elem_offset_array[i+1] - start;
01617     for (size_t j = elementArray[i].vertex_count(); j < conn_len; ++j) {
01618       const size_t vert_idx = elemConnectivityArray[start+j];
01619       assert(vert_idx < vertexHandlesArray.size());
01620       if (!(vertex_flags[vert_idx]&MsqVertex::MSQ_HARD_FIXED))
01621         vertex_flags[vert_idx] |= MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT;
01622     }
01623   }
01624 }
01625 
01626 void PatchData::initialize_data( size_t* elem_offset_array, 
01627                                  unsigned char* vertex_flags,
01628                                  MsqError& err )
01629 {
01630     // Clear out data specific to patch
01631   vertexNormalIndices.clear();
01632   normalData.clear();
01633   //vertexDomainDOF.clear();
01634   
01635     // Clear any vertex->element adjacency data.  It
01636     // is probably invalid, and certainly will be by the time
01637     // this function completes if the mesh contains higher-order
01638     // elements.
01639   vertAdjacencyArray.clear();
01640   vertAdjacencyOffsets.clear();
01641   size_t i, j;
01642   for (i = 0; i < elementArray.size(); ++i)
01643   {
01644     size_t start = elem_offset_array[i];
01645     size_t conn_len = elem_offset_array[i+1] - start;
01646     assert(conn_len > 0);
01647     elementArray[i].set_connectivity( &elemConnectivityArray[start], conn_len );
01648   }
01649      
01650     // Use vertAdjacencyOffsets array as temporary storage.
01651   vertAdjacencyOffsets.resize( vertexHandlesArray.size() + 1 );
01652   size_t* vertex_index_map = arrptr(vertAdjacencyOffsets);
01653   
01654     // Count number of free vertices and initialize vertex_index_map
01655   numFreeVertices = 0;
01656   for (i = 0; i < vertexHandlesArray.size(); ++i) {
01657     if (!(vertex_flags[i] & MsqVertex::MSQ_FIXED))
01658       ++numFreeVertices;
01659     vertex_index_map[i] = i;
01660   }
01661   
01662     // Re-order vertices such that all free vertices are
01663     // first in the list.  Construct map from old to new
01664     // position in list for updating element connectivity.
01665   i = 0;
01666   j = numFreeVertices;
01667   for (;; ++i, ++j) {
01668       // find next fixed vertex in the range [i,numFreeVertices)
01669     for (; i < numFreeVertices && !(vertex_flags[i] & MsqVertex::MSQ_FIXED); ++i);
01670       // if no more fixed vertices in the free vertex range [0,numFreeVertices)
01671     if (i == numFreeVertices)
01672       break;
01673       // find the next free vertex in the range [j,num_nodes)
01674     for ( ; vertex_flags[j] & MsqVertex::MSQ_FIXED; ++j);
01675       // swap fixed (i) and free (j) vertices
01676     vertex_index_map[i] = j;
01677     vertex_index_map[j] = i;
01678     std::swap( vertexHandlesArray[i], vertexHandlesArray[j] );
01679     std::swap( vertex_flags[i], vertex_flags[j] );
01680   }
01681   assert( i == numFreeVertices );
01682   assert( j <= vertexHandlesArray.size() );
01683   
01684     // Update element connectivity data for new vertex indices
01685   for (i = 0; i < elemConnectivityArray.size(); ++i)
01686     elemConnectivityArray[i] = vertex_index_map[elemConnectivityArray[i]];
01687   
01688     // Reorder vertices such that free, slave vertices
01689     // occur after free, non-slave vertices in list.
01690   numSlaveVertices = 0;
01691   for (i = 0; i < vertexHandlesArray.size(); ++i) {
01692     if ((vertex_flags[i] & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT) && 
01693        !(vertex_flags[i] & MsqVertex::MSQ_FIXED))
01694       ++numSlaveVertices;
01695   }
01696   numFreeVertices -= numSlaveVertices;
01697 
01698   if (numSlaveVertices) {
01699       // re-initialize vertex index map
01700     for (i = 0; i < vertexHandlesArray.size(); ++i)
01701       vertex_index_map[i] = i;
01702 
01703       // Re-order free vertices such that all slave vertices are
01704       // last in the list.  Construct map from old to new
01705       // position in list for updating element connectivity.
01706     i = 0;
01707     j = numFreeVertices;
01708     for (;; ++i, ++j) {
01709         // find next slave vertex in the range [i,numFreeVertices)
01710       for (; i < numFreeVertices && !(vertex_flags[i]&MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT); ++i);
01711         // if no more slave vertices in [0,numFreeVertices), then done.
01712       if (i == numFreeVertices)
01713         break;
01714         // find the next free (non-slave) vertex in the range 
01715         //   [numFreeVertices,numFreeVertices+numSlaveVertices)
01716       for ( ; vertex_flags[j] & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT; ++j);
01717         // swap free (j) and slave (i) vertices
01718       vertex_index_map[i] = j;
01719       vertex_index_map[j] = i;
01720       std::swap( vertexHandlesArray[i], vertexHandlesArray[j] );
01721       std::swap( vertex_flags[i], vertex_flags[j] );
01722     }
01723     assert( i == numFreeVertices );
01724     assert( j <= numFreeVertices + numSlaveVertices );
01725 
01726       // Update element connectivity data for new vertex indices
01727     for (i = 0; i < elemConnectivityArray.size(); ++i)
01728       elemConnectivityArray[i] = vertex_index_map[elemConnectivityArray[i]];
01729   }
01730   
01731     // Clear temporary data    
01732   vertAdjacencyOffsets.clear();
01733   
01734   notify_new_patch( );
01735 }
01736 
01737 size_t PatchData::num_corners() const
01738 {
01739   size_t result = 0;
01740   for (unsigned i = 0; i < elementArray.size(); ++i)
01741     result += elementArray[i].vertex_count();
01742   return result;
01743 }
01744 
01745 
01746 void PatchData::fill( size_t num_vertex, const double* coords,
01747                       size_t num_elem, EntityTopology type, 
01748                       const size_t* connectivity,
01749                       const bool* fixed, 
01750                       MsqError& err )
01751 {
01752   std::vector<EntityTopology> types(num_elem);
01753   std::fill( types.begin(), types.end(), type );
01754   const EntityTopology* type_ptr = num_elem ? arrptr(types) : 0;
01755   this->fill( num_vertex, coords, num_elem, type_ptr, connectivity, fixed, err );
01756   MSQ_CHKERR(err);
01757 }
01758   
01759     
01760 void PatchData::fill( size_t num_vertex, const double* coords,
01761                       size_t num_elem, const EntityTopology* types,
01762                       const size_t* conn,
01763                       const bool* fixed, 
01764                       MsqError& err )
01765 {
01766   std::vector<size_t> lengths( num_elem );
01767   std::transform( types, types + num_elem, lengths.begin(), 
01768                       std::ptr_fun(TopologyInfo::corners) );
01769   const size_t* len_ptr = num_elem ? arrptr(lengths) : 0;
01770   this->fill( num_vertex, coords, num_elem, types, len_ptr, conn, fixed, err );
01771   MSQ_CHKERR(err);
01772 } 
01773     
01774 void PatchData::fill( size_t num_vertex, const double* coords,
01775                       size_t num_elem, const EntityTopology* types,
01776                       const size_t* lengths,
01777                       const size_t* conn,
01778                       const bool* fixed,
01779                       MsqError& err )
01780 {
01781   size_t i;
01782   
01783     // count vertex uses
01784   size_t num_uses = std::accumulate( lengths, lengths + num_elem, 0 );
01785 
01786     // Allocate storage for data
01787   vertexArray.resize( num_vertex );
01788   vertexHandlesArray.resize( num_vertex );
01789   elementArray.resize( num_elem );
01790   elementHandlesArray.resize( num_elem );
01791   elemConnectivityArray.resize( num_uses );
01792   numFreeVertices = 0;
01793   numSlaveVertices = 0;
01794   
01795   // Must call clear() first so that any stale values get
01796   // zero'd when we call resize.
01797   byteArray.clear();
01798   if (fixed) {
01799     byteArray.resize( num_vertex, 0 );
01800     for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
01801       if (fixed[i])
01802         byteArray[i] |= (MsqVertex::MSQ_HARD_FIXED|MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED);
01803   }
01804   
01805   for (i = 0; i < num_elem; ++i) {
01806     element_by_index(i).set_element_type( types[i] );
01807     elementHandlesArray[i] = (Mesh::ElementHandle)i;
01808   }
01809   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
01810     vertexHandlesArray[i] = (Mesh::VertexHandle)i;
01811   
01812   memcpy( get_connectivity_array(), conn, num_uses * sizeof(size_t) );
01813   
01814   std::vector<size_t> offsets( num_elem + 1 );
01815   size_t sum = offsets[0] = 0;
01816   for (i = 1; i <= num_elem; ++i)
01817     offsets[i] = sum += lengths[i-1];
01818   
01819   const Settings::HigherOrderSlaveMode ho_mode = mSettings ? mSettings->get_slaved_ho_node_mode() : Settings::SLAVE_ALL;
01820   switch (ho_mode) {
01821   case Settings::SLAVE_ALL:
01822     byteArray.resize( num_vertex, 0 );
01823     enslave_higher_order_nodes( arrptr(offsets), arrptr(byteArray), err );  
01824     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01825     break;
01826   case Settings::SLAVE_NONE:
01827       // Do nothing.  We clear other bits when processing the 'fixed' array above.
01828     break;
01829   default:
01830     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Specified higher-order noded slaving scheme not supported "
01831                     "when initializind PatchData using PatchData::fill",
01832                     MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
01833     return;
01834   }
01835   
01836   this->initialize_data( arrptr(offsets), arrptr(byteArray), err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01837   
01838     // initialize_data will re-order vertex handles and
01839     // update element connectivity accordingly.  Use
01840     // the values we stored in vertexHandlesArray to
01841     // figure out the new index of each vertex, and initialize
01842     // the vertex.
01843   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i) 
01844     vertexArray[i] = coords + 3*(size_t)vertexHandlesArray[i];
01845   
01846   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
01847     vertexArray[i].flags() = byteArray[i];
01848 }
01849   
01850 void PatchData::make_handles_unique( Mesh::EntityHandle* handles,
01851                                      size_t& count,
01852                                      size_t* index_map )
01853 {
01854   if (count < 2)
01855   {
01856     return;
01857   }
01858     // save this now, as we'll be changing count later
01859   const size_t* index_end = index_map + count;
01860   
01861   if (index_map)
01862   {
01863       // Copy input handle list into index map as a temporary
01864       // copy of the input list.
01865     assert( sizeof(Mesh::EntityHandle) == sizeof(size_t) );
01866     memcpy( index_map, handles, count*sizeof(size_t) );
01867   }
01868 
01869     // Make handles a unique list
01870   std::sort( handles, handles + count );
01871   Mesh::EntityHandle* end = std::unique( handles, handles + count );
01872   count = end - handles;
01873 
01874   if (index_map)
01875   {
01876       // Replace each handle in index_map with the index of
01877       // its position in the handles array
01878     Mesh::EntityHandle* pos;
01879     for (size_t* iter = index_map; iter != index_end; ++iter)
01880     {
01881       pos = std::lower_bound( handles, handles + count, (Mesh::EntityHandle)*iter );
01882       *iter = pos - handles;
01883     }
01884   }
01885 }
01886 
01887 void PatchData::fill_global_patch( MsqError& err )
01888 {
01889   GlobalPatch gp;
01890   gp.set_mesh( get_mesh() );
01891   PatchIterator iter( &gp );
01892   bool b = iter.get_next_patch( *this, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01893   if (!b) 
01894     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Empty patch in PatchData::fill_global_patch",MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
01895   assert(b);
01896 }
01897 
01898 void PatchData::set_mesh_entities( 
01899                           std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& elements,
01900                           std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>& free_vertices,
01901                           MsqError& err )
01902 {
01903   Mesh* current_mesh = get_mesh();
01904   if (!current_mesh) {
01905     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No Mesh associated with PatchData.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01906     return;
01907   }
01908   
01909   if (elements.empty()) {
01910     clear();
01911     return;
01912   }
01913   
01914   elementHandlesArray = elements;
01915   get_mesh()->elements_get_attached_vertices( arrptr(elementHandlesArray),
01916                                               elementHandlesArray.size(),
01917                                               vertexHandlesArray,
01918                                               offsetArray,
01919                                               err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01920   
01921     // Construct CSR-rep element connectivity data
01922   size_t num_vert = vertexHandlesArray.size();
01923   elemConnectivityArray.resize( num_vert );
01924   make_handles_unique( arrptr(vertexHandlesArray), 
01925                        num_vert, 
01926                        arrptr(elemConnectivityArray) ); 
01927   vertexHandlesArray.resize( num_vert );
01928 
01929     // Get element topologies
01930   std::vector<EntityTopology> elem_topologies(elementHandlesArray.size());
01931   get_mesh()->elements_get_topologies( arrptr(elementHandlesArray),
01932                                        arrptr(elem_topologies),
01933                                        elementHandlesArray.size(),
01934                                        err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01935   
01936     // get vertex bits from mesh
01937   byteArray.resize( vertexHandlesArray.size() );
01938   get_mesh()->vertices_get_byte( arrptr(vertexHandlesArray), 
01939                                  arrptr(byteArray), 
01940                                  vertexHandlesArray.size(), 
01941                                  err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01942   
01943     // if free_vertices is not empty, then we need to mark as
01944     // fixed any vertices *not* in that list.
01945   if (free_vertices.size() == 1) {
01946     for (size_t i = 0; i < vertexHandlesArray.size(); ++i)
01947       if (vertexHandlesArray[i] == free_vertices.front())
01948         byteArray[i] &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01949       else
01950         byteArray[i] |= MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01951   }
01952   else if (!free_vertices.empty()){
01953       // sort and remove duplicates from free_vertices list.
01954     std::sort(free_vertices.begin(), free_vertices.end());
01955     free_vertices.erase( 
01956         std::unique(free_vertices.begin(), free_vertices.end()), 
01957         free_vertices.end() );
01958     
01959     for (size_t i = 0; i < vertexHandlesArray.size(); ++i) {
01960       if ((byteArray[i] & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT) ||
01961           std::binary_search(free_vertices.begin(), free_vertices.end(), vertexHandlesArray[i]))
01962         byteArray[i] &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01963       else
01964         byteArray[i] |= MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01965     }
01966   }
01967 
01968     // set element types
01969   elementArray.resize( elementHandlesArray.size() );
01970   for (size_t i = 0; i < elementHandlesArray.size(); ++i)
01971     elementArray[i].set_element_type( elem_topologies[i] );
01972   
01973     // get element connectivity, group vertices by free/slave/fixed state
01974   initialize_data( arrptr(offsetArray), arrptr(byteArray), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01975   
01976     // get vertex coordinates
01977   vertexArray.resize( vertexHandlesArray.size() );
01978   get_mesh()->vertices_get_coordinates( arrptr(vertexHandlesArray),
01979                                     arrptr(vertexArray),
01980                                     vertexHandlesArray.size(),
01981                                     err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01982 
01983     // set vertex flags
01984   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertexArray.size(); ++i)
01985     vertexArray[i].flags() = byteArray[i];
01986 }
01987 
01988 
01989 void PatchData::get_sample_location( size_t element_index,
01990                                      Sample sample,
01991                                      Vector3D& result,
01992                                      MsqError& err ) const
01993 {
01994   const MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index( element_index );
01995   const NodeSet ho_bits = non_slave_node_set( element_index );
01996   const MappingFunction* const f = get_mapping_function( elem.get_element_type() );
01997   if (!f) {
01998     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No mapping function", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
01999     return;
02000   }
02001   
02002   double coeff[27];
02003   size_t num_coeff, index[27];
02004   f->coefficients( sample, ho_bits, coeff, index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN( err );
02005   f->convert_connectivity_indices( elem.node_count(), index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02006   
02007   const size_t* const conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
02008   assert( num_coeff > 0 );
02009   result = coeff[0] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[0]] );
02010   for (unsigned i = 1; i < num_coeff; ++i) 
02011     result += coeff[i] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[i]] );
02012 }
02013 
02014 
02015 NodeSet PatchData::non_slave_node_set( size_t element_index ) const
02016 {
02017   const MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index(element_index);
02018   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
02019   const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
02020   const size_t n = elem.node_count();
02021 
02022   MsqError err;
02023   bool have_midedge, have_midface, have_midelem;
02024   unsigned num_edge = 0, num_face = 0, num_corner = TopologyInfo::corners(type);
02025   TopologyInfo::higher_order( type, n, have_midedge, have_midface, have_midelem, err );
02026   num_edge = TopologyInfo::edges(type);
02027   if (TopologyInfo::dimension(type) == 2)
02028     num_face = 1;
02029   else 
02030     num_face = TopologyInfo::faces(type);
02031   
02032   NodeSet result;
02033   result.set_all_corner_nodes(type);
02034   if (have_midedge) {
02035     for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_edge; ++i) {
02036       if (!(vertex_by_index(conn[num_corner+i]).get_flags() & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT))
02037         result.set_mid_edge_node(i);
02038     }
02039   }
02040   if (have_midface) {
02041     for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_face; ++i) {
02042       if (!(vertex_by_index(conn[num_corner+num_edge+i]).get_flags() & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT))
02043         result.set_mid_face_node(i);
02044     }
02045   }
02046   if (have_midelem && !(vertex_by_index(conn[num_corner+num_edge+num_face]).get_flags() & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT))
02047     result.set_mid_region_node();
02048 
02049   return result;
02050 }
02051 
02052 void PatchData::get_samples( size_t element, std::vector<Sample>& samples, MsqError& ) const
02053 {
02054   NodeSet ns = get_samples( element );
02055   samples.resize( ns.num_nodes() );
02056   std::vector<Sample>::iterator i = samples.begin();
02057   
02058   unsigned j;
02059   EntityTopology type = element_by_index(element).get_element_type();
02060   for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::corners(type); ++j)
02061     if (ns.corner_node(j))
02062       *(i++) = Sample( 0, j );
02063   for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::edges(type); ++j)
02064     if (ns.mid_edge_node(j))
02065       *(i++) = Sample( 1, j );
02066   if (TopologyInfo::dimension(type) == 3) {
02067     for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::faces(type); ++j)
02068       if (ns.mid_face_node(j))
02069         *(i++) = Sample( 2, j );
02070     if (ns.mid_region_node())
02071       *(i++) = Sample( 3, 0 );
02072   }
02073   else if (ns.mid_face_node(0))
02074     *(i++) = Sample( 2, 0 );
02075     
02076   assert( i == samples.end() );
02077 }
02078 
02079 
02080 bool PatchData::attach_extra_data( ExtraData* data )
02081 {
02082   if (data->patchNext) {
02083     return false;
02084   }
02085   
02086   if (!data->patchPtr)
02087     data->patchPtr = this;
02088   else if(data->patchPtr != this)
02089     return false;
02090   
02091   data->patchNext = dataList;
02092   dataList = data;
02093   return true;
02094 }
02095 
02096 bool PatchData::remove_extra_data( ExtraData* data )
02097 {
02098   if (data->patchPtr != this)
02099     return false;
02100   
02101   if (dataList == data) {
02102     dataList = data->patchNext;
02103     data->patchNext = 0;
02104     data->patchPtr = 0;
02105     return true;
02106   }
02107   
02108   for (ExtraData* iter = dataList; iter; iter = iter->patchNext)
02109     if (iter->patchNext == data) {
02110       iter->patchNext = data->patchNext;
02111       data->patchNext = 0;
02112       data->patchPtr = 0;
02113       return true;
02114     }
02115   
02116   return false;
02117 }
02118 
02119 void PatchData::notify_new_patch()
02120 {
02121   for (ExtraData* iter = dataList; iter; iter = iter->patchNext)
02122     iter->notify_new_patch();
02123 }
02124 
02125 void PatchData::notify_sub_patch( PatchData& sub_patch,
02126                                   const size_t* vertex_map,
02127                                   const size_t* element_map,
02128                                   MsqError& err )
02129 {
02130   for (ExtraData* iter = dataList; iter; iter = iter->patchNext)
02131   {
02132     iter->notify_sub_patch( sub_patch, vertex_map, element_map, err );
02133     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02134   }
02135 }
02136 
02137 void PatchData::notify_patch_destroyed()
02138 {
02139     // Remove all ExtraDatas from list and notify them
02140     // that they are being destroyed.
02141   while( dataList ) {
02142     ExtraData* dead_data = dataList;
02143     dataList = dataList->patchNext;
02144     dead_data->patchNext = 0;
02145     dead_data->patchPtr = 0;
02146     dead_data->notify_patch_destroyed( );
02147   }
02148 }
